newsitem.title: UK: Cazenove Indian GDR Index up 0.58 percent.
newsitem.headline: Cazenove Indian GDR Index up 0.58 percent.

text.p: The Cazenove Indian GDR Index rose 0.44 points, or 0.58 percent, to 79.53 points after the Bombay Stock Exchange 30-share index rose 32.57 points to a provisional 3,517.25.
The premium for GDRs over the local market was 9.39 percent.

The Cazenove Index is a capitalisation weighted basket of Indian global depositary receipts and measures the change from midday on the previous trading day to midday today. -- David Chance London newsroom 44 171 542 5887
